item.description:
Come play ultimate frisbee!

So, we have been meeting since May on Wednesdays, but we have not been using the Meetup site. We have managed to have a fairly steady turnout, but I think it might help some people if we used the site more.

I will try to keep the calendar up to date. Also I will send out a poll so we can schedule alternate meet up times (rain dates, etc.).

See you soon!
item.how_to_find_us: We gather near the big, white arch.

group.name: The Salem Ultimate Frisbee Meetup Group

item.name: Ultimate Game
